definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: When we talked about the photoelectric effect, that was called the work function.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們在研究光電效應，這被稱爲功函數。

sentences.english: This is obviously due to the Compton and photoelectric effects.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，這是由於康普頓效應與光電效應作用的緣故。

sentences.english: So, starting back with the photoelectric effect -- yes.
sentences.chinese: 好了，開始光電效應的話題，好。

sentences.english: Another phenomenon mentioned by Einstein was the so-called photoelectric effect .
sentences.chinese: 愛因斯坦提到的另一個現象是所謂的光電效應。
